Package ohos.sensor.bean

Class SensorBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.sensor.bean.SensorBase
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CategoryBody, CategoryEnvironment, CategoryLight, CategoryMotion, CategoryOrientation, CategoryOther

    public class SensorBase
extends Object
    A base class that describes the basic attributes of a sensor.

    The basic attributes include the ID, name, manufacturer, version, maximum measurement range, resolution, flags, maximum number of hardware FIFO elements, maximum sampling interval, and minimum sampling interval of a sensor. This class also provides methods for obtaining the sensor attributes.

    Since:
    1
    SystemCapability
    SystemCapability.Sensors#SENSOR

    • Constructor Detail

      • SensorBase

        public SensorBase​(int sensorId,
                  String name,
                  String vendor,
                  int version,
                  float upperRange,
                  float resolution,
                  int flags,
                  int cacheMaxCount,
                  long minInterval,
                  long maxInterval)
        Default constructor used to create a SensorBase instance.
        Parameters:
        sensorId - Indicates the ID of the sensor.
        name - Indicates the name of the sensor.
        vendor - Indicates the manufacturer of the sensor.
        version - Indicates the version of the sensor.
        upperRange - Indicates the maximum measurement range of the sensor.
        resolution - Indicates the resolution of the sensor.
        flags - Indicates the flags of the sensor.
        cacheMaxCount - Indicates the maximum number of hardware FIFO elements supported by the sensor.
        minInterval - Indicates the minimum sampling interval of the sensor, in nanoseconds.
        maxInterval - Indicates the maximum sampling interval of the sensor, in nanoseconds.
        Since:
        1
